name: Innovar Marketing
tagline: San Jose Web Design & Graphic Design Company
description:
Innovar Marketing is a web design, graphic design, and internet marketing firm that serves small and medium-size organizations throughout the greater Silicon Valley and Monterey Bay areas.
Our team is formed by a group of skilled and experienced marketers and web/graphic designers from a diverse educational, cultural, ethnic, and linguistic background who strives to always do the best possible job.
